quote: I came to the plain fields of Ohio with pictures painted by Hollywood movies and the works of Tennessee Williams and Arthur Miller. None of them had much to say, if at all, about Dayton, Ohio.
quote_letters: I CAME TO THE PLAIN FIELDS OF OHIO WITH PICTURES PAINTED BY HOLLYWOOD MOVIES AND THE WORKS OF TENNESSEE WILLIAMS AND ARTHUR MILLER NONE OF THEM HAD MUCH TO SAY IF AT ALL ABOUT DAYTON OHIO
